About Tweet

Hi, I am Miguel Mota.

I am a 21 year old with 3 years of experience in web development, particularly in HTML5, JavaScript, and PHP. Currently I am a developer for XTOPOLY, Inc., a mobile interative agency.

I have passion for what I do and everyday I'm exploring new challenges. This flying lawnmower is my inspiration.

View résumé »

About the site

This site is built with jekyll, a static site generator in Ruby. I will ocasionally express thoughts and findings which I find worthy of sharing.

What is moogs?

moogs is my alias on the interwebz. Moogs, LLC. (moogs.io) is what I use as my company name.

MOOGS is a an acronym for Making Overly Outrages Great Sandwiches

I'll make you a sandwich.

Some random facts

  • My inner child is obese
  • Can juggle stuff
  • I take showers naked
  • If I had a turtle I'd name it Cornelius
  • Zombie killing is my favorite hobby
  • Once captured my fart in a jar
  • That last fact was a lie
